title: NO ICON
body: the icon for the battle boss event isnt loading on my client it has said i earned it but the icon isn't showing up in my loot nor my collection plz help ?

replies.body: Some of the Arcade Poro icons didn't quite make it in time so that you could continue the next mission, but it does look like they've all been successfully added at this point. Please let me know if you still don't see yours though!
